articles.title: Is it still a good idea to take aspirin to prevent heart disease? Here's what the evidence says - The Conversation
articles.description: If you take a daily low-dose aspirin to prevent heart disease and you’ve never had heart problems before, you might want to talk to your doctor.
articles.content: You might have heard that taking a daily low-dose aspirin can reduce your risk of developing heart disease. But, unless you have been told to take aspirin by your doctor, recent news should make you … [+3342 chars]
